1 #include "lib/ma.h"
2 
3 ma::ma ()
4 {
5  // init map publisher
6  int queue_size;
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
8  map_publisher = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid>("area/map", queue_size, true);
9 
10  // subscribe to map
11  map_exists = false;
12  map_subscriber = nh.subscribe("map", queue_size, &ma::map_callback, this);
13 
14  // wait a bit to see if there is a map provided by another node
15  double loop_rate;
16  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 1.0);
17  Rate rate(loop_rate);
18  double wait_for_map;
19  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/wait_for_map", wait_for_map, 2.0);
20  Time start = Time::now();
21  while (ok() && Time::now() < start + Duration(wait_for_map)) {
22  spinOnce();
23  rate.sleep();
24  }
25 
26  // mission area coordinates
27  vector<pair<double,double>> raw_coords;
28 
29  // there is a map, extract it's coordinates
30  if (map_exists)
31  map_to_coords();
32 
33  // if there is no map, import coordinates
34  else {
35  read_coords();
36 
37  // convert global coordinates
38  if (global) {
39  global_to_local ();
40  }
41 
42  set_origin();
43  }
44 
45  // publish grid map
46  if (map_exists || create_map)
47  map_publisher.publish(get_gridmap());
48  else
49  ROS_INFO("Not publishing map");
50 }
51 
52 void ma::map_to_coords ()
53 {
54  // extract coordinates from map
55  geometry_msgs::Point c;
56 
57  // bottom left
58  c = map.info.origin.position;
59  coords.push_back(c);
60 
61  // bottom right
62  c.x += map.info.width * map.info.resolution;
63  coords.push_back(c);
64 
65  // top right
66  c.y += map.info.height * map.info.resolution;
67  coords.push_back(c);
68 
69  // top left
70  c.x = map.info.origin.position.x;
71  coords.push_back(c);
72 }
73 
74 void ma::read_coords ()
75 {
76  // read area coordinates
77  vector<double> area_x;
78  vector<double> area_y;
79  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/area_x", area_x);
80  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/area_y", area_y);
81  if (map_exists == false && (area_x.size() != area_y.size() || area_x.size() < 3)) {
82  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Invalid area, it must contain at least three coordinates! Exiting...");
83  shutdown();
84  }
85 
86  // store area coordinates in right format
87  for (int i = 0; i < area_x.size(); ++i) {
88  geometry_msgs::Point c;
89  c.x = area_x[i];
90  c.y = area_y[i];
91  coords.push_back(c);
92  }
93 }
94 
95 void ma::map_callback (const nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid::ConstPtr& msg)
96 {
97  // store map
98  map = *msg;
99  map_exists = true;
100 
101  // use only initial map
102  map_subscriber.shutdown();
103 }
